kDesc
It's the Modern Ornaments set! Includes three pieces of modern art, bundled together and offered at a discount.[#Legal]
Voici un pack de décorations modernes ! Comprend trois œuvres d'art moderne, réunies à prix réduit.[#Legal]
Das moderne Verzierungs-Set! Enthält drei Werke moderner Kunst und ist als Set zum Sonderpreis erhältlich.[#Legal]
Ecco il set delle decorazioni moderne! Include tre pezzi di arte moderna in un unico pacchetto a un prezzo scontato. [#Legal]
¡El conjunto de adornos modernos! Incluye tres obras de arte moderno, reunidas y con descuento.[#Legal]
It's the Modern Ornaments set! Includes three pieces of Modern Art (Gears etc.) 1, 2 and 3, bundled together and offered at a discount.[#Legal]
현대적인 장식물 세트입니다! 세 종류의 현대적인 톱니바퀴 예술품을 포함하며, 세트로 묶어 할인가에 제공됩니다.[#Legal]
It's the Modern Ornaments set! Includes three pieces of Modern Art (Gears etc.) 1, 2 and 3, bundled together and offered at a discount.[#Legal]
這是現代風裝飾品組合包，包括巴黎現代風藝術品(齒輪等)1、2、3共三件現代風藝術品，以優惠價推出。[#Legal]
這是現代風裝飾品組合包，包括巴黎現代風藝術品(齒輪等)1、2、3共三件現代風藝術品，以優惠價推出。[#Legal]
